replies.body: I just want to say that I don't feel this article really does any justice to the matches, it provides no details beyond the score, and for the grand final for a region I think that a more detailed report should be provided.

http://oce.lolesports.com/articles/chiefs-face-their-demons
This site shows the game stats and a short description of how the game went, as well as many videos.
Yes, however at the time of the post, that article had yet to be released
Well sorry for being a noob.
It seems that Riot either noticed this post or had something in the works, so I'm grateful that we got a much more detailed post, cheers.
Dj Sona.

that corkie escape right at the end.... jizz in my pants. and those Oriana deletes are to die for.


Dont for get those comentators... "Its a seriously fishy top lane"
WeelPlaid
So I have to go out to a work function last night, working all day today, come home to do my dailies then watch the oce finals,  thats for the spoiler alert in the lobby ya bastards.

WoW and you guys cant even get the VoD's up in less than 7 days....... na and eu ,lcs have vods up in 1 hour,  why bother watching OCE plantinum level players (if they were playing in other regions) DAYS after the games happen when you can watch pro players an hour after the match............. and they wonder why no one watches oce and the support isn't their to build the talent pool,  its coz OCE League of Legends is operating like 486 in 2015.

Considering most professional league of legends players in oce were diamond 1 through to D5 before the server existed, your "plantinum" level players were vsing the highest tier of players before their change to the Oceanic region, dont kid yourself, the oceanic players skill levels arent a joke, its the amount of time the server has been around, we have talent here, its going to take time to build upon it, considering australia as a country doesnt seem to support Esports as a whole making it more difficult to actually get support rolling, but considering from the games at eb expo being something like 200 viewers to our championship series of this year gaining almost 12000 viewers, the growth is there, support it if you want to see support garnered.
it sucks you got the result spoiled but dont just look down upon the OCE region because of a vod being released later than other regions, with more staff, and money.

Sorry about the spoiler man!
VoDs have been up since the event:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=B21FQSZN7Tw

Well worth the watch despite knowing the result!
thats the 1st mainstream pc people got in the 1990's kids.
All i could make out from this article is chiefs going to war

ChuChuz played out of his mind. In the end, it felt as if the support/jg matchup was where Chiefs were ahead. Carbon seemed uncomfortable on Nunu/Lee Sin, after being targeted in pick/ban and Claire not being a support main was out of position sometimes. GG WP Chiefs. GL next year Legacy!
I am so glad that chiefs won the tournie, i hope that OCE can advance further into the pro scene soon

I'm shocked Chiefs won... Seriously shocked... I was so shocked... I almost scared myself.
*Sarcasm
Chiefs definitley deserved to win
Other than Raydere, why is Swiffer such a God?
